County Clare is looking solid today with 4 ft @ 8s WNW swell and fresh 15 mph NW winds. Lahinch Beach and Lahinch Left are your top picks, offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @ 8s with light 5 mph S winds, making for a fun, mellow session at spots like Cregg Beach and Doughmore. By the day after, expect a bump back up to 6 ft @ 9s with moderate 12 mph WNW winds, providing some exciting surf at Crab Island and Lahinch. Best: today.
